Intervention: Full (interactive) version of the decision tool
- Static version of the CanSORT tool (Control)
• Static (non-interactive) version of the CanSORT decision tool
• Static version of the CanSORT tool
Results: Number of patients with specific knowledge of the risks and benefits of treatment options for locoregional breast cancer.

A binary knowledge indicator was created for all patients, indicating a high level of knowledge for patients with a score above 80% on the element scale. The binary knowledge variable was analyzed to determine the intervention effect using an unadjusted and adjusted mixed logistic model regression.
Time limit: 4 to 5 weeks from the date of registration
Title of the arm/group: CanSORT Online Tool (intervention)
Description of the arm/group: Full (interactive) version of the decision tool
Type of measure: Number of participants
Title of the arm/group: Static version of the CanSORT tool (Control)
Description of the arm/group: Static (non-interactive) version of the CanSORT decision tool
• Static version of the CanSORT tool
Type of measure: Number of participants
